audio.all: - No audio or sound</br>- Crackling, rattling, distorted, static, buzzing</br>- Audio balance issue</br>- No sound from one earbud/earpiece</br>- Low audio

mic.1: - Mic does not pick up sound
mic.all: - Mic does not pick up sound</br>- Muffled voice</br>- Mic too sensitive</br>- Distorted sound</br>- Crackling sound</br>- Low volume</br>- Fading sound

power.all: - Headset does not charge</br>- Battery drains fast</br>- Poor battery life</br>- Headset won't power on
